product_entries.section_context_for_this_product_block: DISTRIBUTION PANELS, DISTRIBUTION BOARD & Lighting Panel
product_entries.full_product_description: Electrical / Control  Panels  suitable  for  415  Volt, 3 phase, 3 wire  50Hz  AC  supply  system  fabricated  in compartmentlized  from CRCA sheet  steel not less than 2mm thick duly treated with  7 tanks  process, powder coated with  approved shade and oven dried . The complete panel will have a short circuit with stand capacity of 35 KA for 1 Second, IP 52 rating. It will have a suitable MS base channel powder coated. The panel will be fabricated  in transportable sections. The panel shall have a common copper  earth bar of size 25mm x 5mm at the rear with 2 Nos. earth studs.  The  LT  panel  will  have  suitable  arrangement  for  bus-ducting/  cable  termination  into  various  incoming/outgoing  switchgear  as  required.  Cable termination will be at suitable terminal block at top/bottom of the panel and from the terminal block to switch, connection will be made with solid insulated strip/PVC insulated copper conductor cable of required current rating as required as per SLD. Spares for these LT Panels are included, based on PTS.
product_entries.feature_or_specifications: voltage: 415 volt, phase: 3 phase, wire: 3 wire, frequency: 50hz, material: crca sheet steel (not less than 2mm thick), treatment: 7 tanks process, finish: powder coated with approved shade and oven dried, short circuit withstand capacity: 35 ka for 1 second, rating: ip 52, base channel: ms powder coated, earth bar: copper, earth bar size: 25mm x 5mm, earth studs: 2 nos, arrangement: bus-ducting/cable termination, cable termination: suitable terminal block at top/bottom, connection: solid insulated strip/pvc insulated copper conductor cable, spares: included based on pts

product_entries.section_context_for_this_product_block: DISTRIBUTION PANELS, DISTRIBUTION BOARD & Lighting Panel
product_entries.full_product_description: 415V, 35 KA single front Floor mounted type indoor MEDB to receive input power at CNG Station consisting of  bus bar chamber, cable alley, etc including all  labour  and  materials  with  operating  mechanism,  all  accessories,  mandatory  spares  as  per  PTS,  data  sheet,  auxiliaries   etc  complete  in  all  respects  as specified  in  technical specification,  data  sheet & SLD (Al Bus, I/C-1  & I/C-2: 150A 4P  MCCB, O/G: refer SLD) with  APFC realy and  capacitor 20kVAR (2x2kVAR+2x3kVAR+2x5kVAR)
product_entries.feature_or_specifications: voltage: 415v, short circuit withstand capacity: 35 ka, type: single front floor mounted, location: indoor, bus bar: al, i/c-1 & i/c-2: 150a 4p mccb, apfc relay: included, capacitor: 20 kvar (2x2kvar+2x3kvar+2x5kvar), accessories: all accessories, mandatory spares as per pts, data sheet, auxiliaries, technical specification, sld

product_entries.full_product_description: Supply, Installation, testing & commissioning of UPS ;- PARALLEL REDUNDANT UPS  of 2 X 100% , with BYPASS 230V, 15 kVA rating  with battery charger   each. Installation,  testing & commissioning  of  Parallel redundant  UPS should  be DSP  (Digital Signal Processing), controlled  true on  line double conversion 3 phase input and 1 phase output UPS system with each UPS module having IGBT based rectifier, THD shall be less than 5% at 100% linear load. input power factor should be 0.90 across the load spectrum DSP (Digital signal processing) technology invertor. Supply of UPS DB as mentioned  above & SLD Supply of Battery Bank:- Installation, testing and Commissioning of sealed maintenance free batteries for 15 kVA load, battery charger of suitable capacity, battery MCCB, input panel, Battery racks,connectors and accessories, cable from UPS to batteries etc. 2 nos x 50% VRLA, 12V battery with backup 4 hour . | nan | 1.0 | Lot (LOT) | nan
product_entries.size: rating: 15 kVA, input voltage: 230V, battery voltage: 12V, backup: 4 hour
product_entries.feature_or_specifications: type: parallel redundant, bypass: yes, battery charger: included, control: dsp (digital signal processing), conversion: true on line double, input: 3 phase, output: 1 phase, rectifier: igbt based, thd: less than 5% at 100% linear load, input power factor: 0.90, technology: dsp (digital signal processing) invertor, ups db: included, battery bank: sealed maintenance free, battery mccb: included, input panel: included, battery racks: included, connectors: included, accessories: included, cable from ups to batteries: included, battery: 2 nos x 50% vrla, standard: sld
